title: Oceania Server Maintaintence
body:
Just a quick question,

Half way through a match, the servers went down, I was disconnected and am wondering if I will have the banned/restricted queue penalties?

replies.body:
Hey UndeadHedgehog,

When the servers go down for server maintenance/patches, Leaverbuster punishments are not applied as the game no longer exists once the patch starts. You have nothing to worry about :)
